bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. Arthur Powell. Subpoena

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: Territory of Washington, County of Spokane}ss.
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Cheney, Spokane County, in said Territory.

To the sheriff of Spokane County, Greeting: In the name of the United States, You are hereby commanded to summon J.G. Brophy, N. Thomas, Wm Martin, Louis Lee, James Crenshaw, E. J. YoungE. J. N. Gardner to be and appear before the District Court E. J. Young at the Court House, in Cheney, in said County, on the fifth day of May A.D. 1885, at 9 o'clock, A.M. to there give evi- dence in the above entitled cause on the part of said by command of the court.

WITNESS the Hon. George Turner, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge of said Court, and the Seal thereof affixed, this 1st day of May A.D. 1885 Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk. By R. Strobach Deputy.
Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss.
I hereby certify that I served the within Subpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to E. J. Hanford in said County on this 4th day of May A.D. 1885 E.G. Whittier Sheriff. By Deputy.

In the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, hold- ing terms at Cheney, Spo- kane County, in said Territory
Plaintiff vs.
Defendant.
Returned and filed this 5 day of May A.D. 1885 Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk. By R. Strobach Deputy.
SHERIFF'S FEES. Serving 6 names at 40 240 Mileage 98 miles at 10 980 Total, - - - -$12.20

Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss. I hereby certify that I served the within subpoena on the within named witnesses. J.G. Brophy - N Thomas, Louis Lee, James Crenshaw and E.J. Young by reading the same to each of them personally in Spokane County W.T. on this 4th day of May 1885 after due and dilligence to seek the within named Wm Martin and N. Gardner could not be found in Spokane County W.T. Dated May 5 1885 E.F. Whittier Sheriff By E.J. Hubbard Constable
Fees 5 serv 2.00 66 miles 6.60 $8.60
